channel.title: How to ban white and black from pking
channel.description:
Can someone help me or gice me a link to a tut wich tells how to ban white and black from using for pking? Because one of my admins spawned white for everyone and i just can go through every account and deleting the stuff Help apreciated
Delicious

item.title: How to ban white and black from pking
item.dc:creator: @mattboy mattboy
item.description:
@mattboy wrote:

dude, just tell everyone that if they pk with it, then they will get perm banned, even if they are admins, if they ask or say i didnt know, then just say well u were warned, when u logg in u could also have a window that says, if you pk with white or blk you get perm banned!!!

hope this helps =P
|//|
|_|
(O.o) Hes de king of de bunnies!BEWARE:He pwnz your ass!
(><) Copy this to yer siggy for world domination n33bs!: )
//_\

I know, i tried it, took me bout 20 minutes ( all stuff where somewhere else) but then no1 could get in because the server saved there files with the high bonuses wich where now low, and the server crashed.

But there is a tut somewhere, it checks wich items you are wearing and when wearing white it makes you unable to attack people

item.title: How to ban white and black from pking
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Well, you know that white and black give massive bonusses right?
Like everyone on my server now has multiple sets of white and use it for pking, but this is ruining my server because they now 1 hit everyone, so new players dont stand a chance.
Now there used to be some tuts that when you pk with white or black you get a message saying you cant pk in white, please take it off and then you can attack people with it.
But i cant find that tut anywhere anymore so i was hoping someone has the code for it, or a link to the tut

Read full topic
